comment: /**  * Return the status code that should be returned to the client.  * @return the HTTP status code  */
code: /**  * Return the status code that should be returned to the client.  * @return the HTTP status code  */ public HttpStatus getStatusCode() {     return getReason().getStatus(). }

comment: /**  * Return the reason why the authorization exception was thrown.  * @return the reason  */
code: /**  * Return the reason why the authorization exception was thrown.  * @return the reason  */ public Reason getReason() {     return this.reason. }
